page.title: 14Politics, Murroes area
page.content:
Our constituency is called East Angus. Our present{Member of Parliament}is Peter Fraser and he belongs to the {Conservative}Party.Our previous Member of Parliament was Andrew Welsh and his Party is the{Scottish National Party.} Mr.Welsh is at present the Provost of Angus District.Our district councillor is Alan Grewar. Our regional councillor is Mrs.Elizabeth Hendry.
Every five years there is a general election and stickers and posters are put up.Supporters of each party go around and try to win votes.On the day of the election some schools are used as polling places.After the votes are counted the results are usually on television.About midnight it is known which is the leading party.
